00013 using namespace std;
00014 using namespace tbe;
00015 
00016 class FragBillboardIcon : public tbe::scene::ParticlesEmiter
00017 {
00018 public:
00019 
00020     FragBillboardIcon(PlayManager* playManager)
00021     : tbe::scene::ParticlesEmiter(playManager->parallelscene.particles),
00022     m_playManager(playManager)
00023     {
00024         SetBlendEq(ParticlesEmiter::MODULAR);
00025         SetDepthTest(true);
00026     }
00027 
00028     tbe::scene::Node* Clone()
00029     {
00030         return new FragBillboardIcon(*this);
00031     }
00032 
00033     void SetupBullet(tbe::scene::Particle& p)
00034     {
00035         p.color(1, 1, 1, 0.5);
00036         p.life = 1.0f;
00037     }
00038 
00039     void Process()
00040     {
00041         const Player::Array& players = m_playManager->GetPlayers();
00042 
00043         scene::Particle* particles = BeginParticlesPosProcess();
00044 
00045         unsigned show = 0;
00046         for(unsigned i = 0; i < players.size(); i++)
00047             if(players[i] != m_playManager->GetUserPlayer()
00048                && !players[i]->IsKilled())
00049             {
00050                 particles[show].pos = players[i]->GetPos() + Vector3f(0, 1, 0);
00051                 show++;
00052             }
00053 
00054         SetDrawNumber(show);
00055 
00056         EndParticlesPosProcess();
00057     }
00058 
00059 protected:
00060     PlayManager* m_playManager;
00061 };
00062 
00063 PlayFragManager::PlayFragManager(AppManager* appManager) : PlayManager(appManager)
00064 {
00065     m_playersLabel = new FragBillboardIcon(this);
00066     m_playersLabel->SetTexture(Texture(PARTICLE_PLAYER, true));
00067     m_playersLabel->Build();
00068     manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(m_playersLabel);
00069 }

00073 }

00080 void PlayFragManager::ModSetupAi(Player* player)
00081 {
00082     m_playersLabel->SetNumber(m_players.size());
00083     m_playersLabel->Build();
00084 
00085     player->AttachController(new FragModeAi(this));
00086 }

00088 void PlayFragManager::ModUpdateStateText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00089 {
00090     using namespace gui;
00091 
00092     ss << "Score : " << m_userPlayer->GetScore() << " Point(s)" << endl;
00093 
00094     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00095         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.curChrono << "/" << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00096     else
00097         ss << "Temps : Infinie" << endl;
00098 
00099     if(m_playSetting.winCond > 0)
00100         ss << "Objectif : " << m_playSetting.winCond << endl;
00101 }

00103 void PlayFragManager::ModUpdateScoreListText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00104 {
00105     using namespace gui;
00106 
00107     ss << "Carte : " << map.name << endl;
00108     ss << "Type : Frag" << endl;
00109 
00110     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00111         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00112     else
00113         ss << "Temps : " << "Infinie" << endl;
00114 
00115     ss << endl;
00116 
00117     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_players.size(); i++)
00118         ss << " [" << m_players[i]->GetScore() << "] " << m_players[i]->GetName() << endl;
00119 }

00121 void PlayFragManager::ModUpdateGameOverText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00122 {
00123     using namespace gui;
00124 
00125     if(m_playSetting.winCond > 0)
00126     {
00127         if(m_userPlayer->GetScore() >= m_playSetting.winCond)
00128             ss << "<< VOUS AVEZ GANGEZ !!! >>" << endl;
00129         else
00130             ss << "<< VOUS AVEZ PERDU !!! >>" << endl;
00131 
00132         ss << endl;
00133     }
00134 
00135     ss << "Carte : " << map.name << endl;
00136     ss << "Type : Frag" << endl;
00137 
00138     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00139         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00140     else
00141         ss << "Temps : " << "Infinie" << endl;
00142 
00143     ss << endl;
00144

00146         ss << " [" << m_players[i]->GetScore() << "] " << m_players[i]->GetName() << endl;
00147
